Nerangs.ab: aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā huxšaϑrā huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide hāwan abar urwēs zadan ahurəm mazdąm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide
"At aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā huxšaϑrā huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide, he should hit the hāwan on the urwēs (and continue with) ahurəm mazdąm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide."
aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā huxšaϑrā huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide ēn gyāg hāwan abāz wardēnišn ahurəm mazdąm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide
"At aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā huxšaϑrā huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide, at this passage, he has to turn the hāwan right side (and continue with) ahurəm mazdąm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide."
